Title: Professor
full_research: Theoretical condensed matter physics and nanoscience, including electronic and structural properties of crystals, surfaces, interfaces, and clusters; quasiparticle and optical excitations; electron correlation effects in bulk and reduced-dimensional systems; graphene, carbon nanotubes, quasi-2D materials, and related nanostructures; superconductivity; ab initio pseudopotential theory; topological insulators; electron transport through single molecules.
